permission.name: basicAuth
permission.title: Client should auth via basic http auth containing email and password.

200.description: The path to the public key url.

Auth.description: should contain the email and password, like "Basic " + base64encode(email + ":" password) (see examples).

401.description: Basic authorization header is wrong or not set.

title: Get the server jwt public key
name: GetJwtPublicKey
